title: Friday Night 40K
description: Open play and league games. All experience levels welcome. Tables provided, bring your army!

title: Friday Night 40K
description: Open play and league games. All experience levels welcome. Tables provided, bring your army!

title: AoS Sunday Casual
description: Casual matched play. Bring 1000pts. Terrain and mats provided. Pizza for everyone!

title: AoS Monthly Tournament
description: 2000pt matched play tournament. 5 rounds Swiss. Prizes for top 3. Pre-registration required.

title: Necromunda Underhive Skirmish
description: Gang warfare in the underhive. Bring your gang (up to 1000 credits). Hired guns and Hangers-on welcome. New players start with a free gang build session.

title: 40K Tournament Qualifier
description: ITC format, 2000pts. Top 2 players advance to regional qualifier. Sign up required.

title: Horus Heresy League Night
description: 30K league continues. Round 2 of the Isstvan campaign. Narrative play, bring 2500pts.

title: Horus Heresy League Night
description: 30K league continues. Round 3 of the Isstvan campaign.

title: Kill Team Open Day
description: Beginner-friendly Kill Team event. Demo games, free faction tasters, and prize draws throughout the day. No experience needed — all teams provided.

title: Kill Team Spring Doubles
description: Pairs tournament — one player runs Operations, the other runs the Dataslate. 100pt rosters. Pre-registration essential; limited to 16 teams.

title: Bolt Action Campaign Night
description: Ongoing WW2 campaign. Round 4 — Battle of the Bulge scenario. New players can join at any point.

title: Bolt Action Campaign Night
description: Ongoing WW2 campaign. Round 5 — Market Garden scenario.

title: KoW League Round 3
description: Round 3 of our spring Kings of War league. 1500pts Clash of Kings format. Bring painted armies!

title: KoW Beginner Workshop
description: New to Kings of War? Learn the rules with demo games. Loaner armies available. Free to attend!

title: Warmachine Prime League Kickoff
description: Start of our 6-week Warmachine Prime league. 75pt lists. All factions welcome. Prizes at the end of the season.

title: 40K Casual Sunday
description: Relaxed open play. Any points level, any format. Terrain provided. Bring snacks and friends!

title: AoS Grand Tournament Qualifier
description: Official GW GT qualifier. 2000pts, matched play, painted armies required. Top 4 qualify for Nationals. Early bird tickets available until March 1st.

title: Necromunda Dominion Campaign Launch
description: Starting a new 8-week Dominion campaign. Create your gang, pick your territory, and fight for control of the hive. Up to 12 participants.
